name: Quest Forge 3D
description:
The chicken race mechanic of Quest Forge for the NES returns in the crazy high-def 3D action adventure game. Charge your attack just in time for the automated battle system to kick in to get the best results!

WASD: Moves your character around.

QE: Rotates your view.

ZC: Cycles equipment for the left and right hand.

SPACE: Charges your attack.

Controls are mirrored on the numpad so you can mix and match which hand takes care of what (or play completely one handed). Enjoy!
